text: We're told that the Chinese have yellow skin, but we've never seen a man with a skin like a ripe lemon or egg yolk. We're told that the Chinese number billions, but no one has counted them one by one. We are assured that the Chinese speak Chinese, but we have never heard anyone speak that foreign language. The letters we sent to China have not been answered and our ambassadors have not returned. In short, the yellow danger is a ruse of our enemies. FIN
title: El peligro amarillo
author: Marco Denevi
